mapper.insert: insert into db_checkpaypaladdress (SID, OPER, SHOPID, PRICE, NEWPAYPALADDRESS, CREATEOPER, CREATETIME, ITEMID, OPERTIME, SITE, ORGPAYPALADDRESS, FLAG, ERROR) values (#{sid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shopid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{newpaypaladdress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createoper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{itemid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{site,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgpaypaladdress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{flag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{error,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update db_checkpaypaladdress set OPER = #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHOPID = #{shopid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRICE = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, NEWPAYPALADDRESS = #{newpaypaladdress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATEOPER = #{createoper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATETIME = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ITEMID = #{itemid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPERTIME = #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SITE = #{site,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORGPAYPALADDRESS = #{orgpaypaladdress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FLAG = #{flag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ERROR = #{error,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where SID = #{sid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select SID, OPER, SHOPID, PRICE, NEWPAYPALADDRESS, CREATEOPER, CREATETIME, ITEMID, OPERTIME, SITE, ORGPAYPALADDRESS, FLAG, ERROR from db_checkpaypaladdress where SID = #{sid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
select SID, OPER, SHOPID, PRICE, NEWPAYPALADDRESS, CREATEOPER, CREATETIME, ITEMID, OPERTIME, SITE, ORGPAYPALADDRESS, FLAG, ERROR from db_checkpaypaladdress
